dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oleg Pereverzev, the pianist, only 45 years old… that's just tragic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oleg Pereverzev, the pianist, only forty five years old... that's just tragic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh virtuoso pianist Oleg Pereverzev has passed away at the age of 45 in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it sounds like he was found in his apartment in Almaty days after he passed. So sad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it sounds like he was found in his apartment in Almaty days after he passed. So sad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The musician died on April 11, but the news only became public several days later. According to a post on Facebook by Alim Zairov, Pereverzev's body was found in his own apartment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, was there any indication of what happened? It just seems so sudden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, was there any indication of what happened? It just seems so sudden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: According to that Facebook post by Alim Zairov, no cause was mentioned publicly yet. He'd literally just celebrated his birthday too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: According to that Facebook post by Alim Zairov, no cause was mentioned publicly yet. He'd literally just celebrated his birthday too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a post on Facebook by Alim Zairov, Pereverzev's body was found in his own apartment. The pianist had recently celebrated his birthday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right… I remember him from that viral video—playing Flight of the Bumblebee on two instruments at once. Over three million views, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right... I remember him from that viral video-playing Flight of the Bumblebee on two instruments at once. Over three million views, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A video of him performing "Flight of the Bumblebee" on two instruments simultaneously garnered over three million views on YouTube.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And he also appeared on shows like Ukraine's Got Talent and Minute of Fame. Really versatile performer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And he also appeared on shows like Ukraine's Got Talent and Minute of Fame. Really versatile performer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The virtuoso took part in the Russian show Minute of Fame and the Ukrainian show Ukraine's Got Talent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But 45… that's no age at all. Makes you wonder about the pressures artists face.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But forty five... that's no age at all. Makes you wonder about the pressures artists face.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And TengrinewsTV did a feature on him back in 2014 as one of Kazakhstan's talents. He had such presence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And TengrinewsTV did a feature on him back in twenty fourteen as one of Kazakhstan's talents. He had such presence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2014, Oleg Pereverzev was featured in a TengrinewsTV segment about talented Kazakhstani individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do we know when the farewell ceremony will be?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do we know when the farewell ceremony will be?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They said the details will be announced later. I hope fans get a chance to pay respects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They said the details will be announced later. I hope fans get a chance to pay respects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The date and location of the farewell ceremony will be announced later.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Such a loss to the music world. That kind of virtuosity is rare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Such a loss to the music world. That kind of virtuosity is rare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And to think his talent touched so many through those YouTube videos and TV appearances…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And to think his talent touched so many through those YouTube videos and T V appearances...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. Just goes to show how fragile it all is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. Just goes to show how fragile it all is.
